main event: Multiple sightings of airborne objects in formation and with unusual characteristics were reported in Little Neck, New York in July 1958.
interesting points: About 20 objects were observed in formation, flying from east to southeast.
Some objects were described as large enough to see windows and running lights, with white, red, and green flashing lights.
One witness reported an object hovering over a house before moving slowly to the south and disappearing.
A US Air Force captain reported observing a round object approximately 15-20 feet in diameter with a brilliant white light on the underside, moving at a relatively slow speed.
One witness expressed a belief that the objects seen were flying saucers.
witnesses: civilian, Robert C. Gardner; US Air Force Captain, John McCurdy
